name: generate_id
description: Generate a unique ID for a message.

name: list_users
description: List all users in the workspace.

response.name: user_list
response.description: List of all users in the workspace.

name: get_user_id
description: Get user ID from user name.

response.name: user_id
response.description: User ID of the user, or None if not found.

name: message_login
description: Log in a user with the given user ID to messeage application.

user_id.description: User ID of the user to log in.

response.name: message
response.description: A message describing the result of the login attempt.

name: send_message
description: Send a message to a user.

receiver_id.description: User ID of the user to send the message to.

response.name: message
response.description: A message describing the result of the send attempt.

name: delete_message
description: Delete a message sent to a user.

receiver_id.description: User ID of the user to send the message to.

message_id.description: ID of the message to be deleted.

response.name: message
response.description: A message describing the result of the deletion attempt.

name: view_messages_received
description: View all messages sent to the current user.

response.name: messages
response.description: Dictionary of senders and their messages sent to the current user.

name: view_messages_sent
description: View all historical messages sent by the current user.

response.name: messages
response.description: Dictionary of receivers and messages sent by the current user.

name: add_contact
description: Add a contact to the workspace.

user_name.description: User name of contact to be added.

response.name: message
response.description: A message describing the result of the addition attempt.

name: search_messages
description: Search for messages containing a specific keyword.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in messages.

response.name: results
response.description: List of dictionaries containing matching messages.

name: get_message_stats
description: Get statistics about messages for the current user.
